## Filtering: `dplyr::filter()`

<details><summary>*Click here to show setup code.*</summary>
```{r include = FALSE}
### Filtering: `dplyr::filter()`

```
```{r 22-setup-22-filter-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)

library(conflicted)
conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr")
```
</details>


```{r include = FALSE}
# example data
```
```{r 22-example-data}
flights
?flights
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# filter 1
```
```{r 22-filter-1}
flights %>%
  filter(dep_time < 600)
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# filter 2
```
```{r 22-filter-2}
flights %>%
  filter(is.na(dep_time))
```
